py2dot
======

Convert a python file to a dot file, viewable with Graphviz.
Source files can be downloaded from Pypi.


Usage
-----

Basic usage:
$> ./py2dot -f <filename.py> | dot -Tpng | display

See help for available options:
$> ./py2dot -h


Documentation
-------------

Autogenerate with:
$> epydoc py2dot

Or available at:
http://packages.python.org/py2dot/
